entries.name: Caroline B. Long, MD
entries.title: Fellow
entries.title-details: A fellow is a physician who has completed residency and is receiving specialized training in one particular field within pediatrics (eg. cardiology, pulmonology, etc.)
entries.address: 125 East 72nd Street Suite: 1A New York, NY 10021
entries.bio: Clinical interests include obesity and school nutrition. She also enjoys boating and spending time with her 3 children.
